msg_esergan_not_av: ESRGAN model not available for local processing. ESRGAN works better on photos.
msg_photo_not_av: SRWNN model for photos is still a work in progress.
msg_experimental_feature: This is an experimental feature. It may produce nightmare fuel content.
msg_local_warning: Local results are inferior due to the compressed model, app may crash if your image is too big and/or if you don't have enough computing resources on your device.
pre_process_warning: If app crashes after touching the start button, you image may be to large to be processed in your device. Try again with a smaller image or try processing on web inestead of local
pre_process_warning2: Your image is about to be processed online, ads are only shown when you chose to process your image online, in order to help me keep the server running. You can remove the ads by buying processing credits (CR).
loading_dialog: The app is working... this may take a while but it's ok as long as it doesn't crashes and closes.
about_text1: Super Resolution Waifu Neural Network is a convolutional neural network. Escentially an implementation of waifu2x (by nagadomi) on tensorflow but using my own anime gurl pics dataset (8k+ images) and making some tweaks to the model architecture which is based on VGG11.
about_text2: A reduced version of the model (tflite) is used to run on-device whereas the full model runs on web.
about_text3: More info about SRWNN model on my github. And more information about the ESRGAN implementation can also be found on my github repo.
posible_error0: - Your file is too big, try a smaller image.
posible_error1: - The server has decided to die and I'll have to fix it.
posible_error2: - Connection to server unestable or lost.
posible_error3: - Mantainace or updates are being deployed on the server.
server_image_error: Error ocurred while processing your image.
large_errors: Your image may be too big. Or the server is too busy.
alloc_error_desc: The image dimentions are too big to be allocated and processed on device. Try on web.
enter_mail_to_reset_ps: Enter an email to reset password
6chr_or_more_ps_plz: Password must be at least 6 charaters
reset_ps_mail1: A mail has been send to
reset_ps_mail2: in order to reset your password.
name: Name
error_has_occured: An error has occurred, try again.
limit_reached: You have reached your mothly limit for processing/downloading images
upgrade_pls: Buy credits to process more images.
faq1: You can downoad and process up to 10 images per month for free. If you would like to be able to process more images, buy credits (CR), one credit will allow you to proces and download 1 image (you can process many times but the credit is used when you download the image), and you can also use your CR for other services within the web app.
sell_text: CR allows you to process and download more images once you have reached the monthly limit. While you have CR, you wont see any ads.
cr_added: CR added to your account. You can also use CR with other services like Image Background Remover through the Web APP.
adjust_parameters_to_get_desired_result: Adjust parameters and get a more accurate result. Not available with fast processing.
big_image_warning: Big images will take longer to be processed and may fail. The server will try to reduce the image in order to avoid errors.
